name: John M Buscemi
body:
### Me in Brief.
I recently graduated from code school at The Iron Yard in Durham, NC and currently live in Raleigh. At the end of August I'll be starting work as the TA for the next Iron Yard Rails cohort.  Before being a developer, I was an Aerospace Engineer designing jet engines for a major aerospace company.  Pretty neat right?  It was, but I think code is more fun.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
